bpp/descriptor.name: Sabhyasha Retail Tech Private Limited
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: One Stop Shop For Indian Handicraft Handloom
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Sabhyasha is a tech driven organisation working with an objective to empower the Handicraft Artisans and Handloom weavers / Producer Groups to be part of an exclusive democratic marketplace to showcase and sale products directly to consumers with best in class service. Which will help them improvise and scale up their business.

descriptor.name: Fortune 1 Liter
descriptor.short_desc: Enjoy the richness of Fortune's premium quality cooking oil in this convenient 1 liter pack. Perfect for all your cooking and baking needs.
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our Oil & Ghee category, where we pride ourselves on offering the finest quality oils and ghee products to accompany your cooking needs. Within this category, you will find the renowned 'Fortune 1 Liter Pack' of oil.The Fortune 1 Liter Pack is a staple in many households due to its exceptional quality and versatility in cooking. This pack contains 1 liter of premium oil that is perfect for frying, sautéing, baking, and all other cooking purposes. Made from the finest ingredients, this oil is known for enhancing the flavors of your dishes and providing a rich and indulgent taste.Crafted with expertise and attention to detail, the Fortune oil in this pack is carefully refined to ensure purity and consistency in every drop. It has a high smoke point, making it ideal for high-heat cooking methods, and is also rich in essential nutrients that are beneficial for your overall health.Whether you are whipping up a quick stir-fry, deep frying your favorite snacks, or preparing a delicious curry, the Fortune 1 Liter Pack of oil will always deliver outstanding results. Its light texture and neutral taste make it a versatile choice for various culinary creations, allowing you to experiment with different flavors and cuisines.Add the Fortune 1 Liter Pack of oil to your kitchen essentials today and take your cooking to the next level. With its superior quality, exceptional taste, and unmatched performance, this oil is sure to become a trusted companion in your culinary adventures. Elevate your dishes and impress your family and guests with the premium Fortune oil in this convenient and economical pack.

descriptor.name: Fortune Oil 5 Liter
descriptor.short_desc: Get the Fortune Oil 5 Liter Pack to fulfill your cooking needs with high quality oil for a healthy and tasty meal.
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our Oil & Ghee category, where you can find the finest selection of high-quality oils and ghees for all your culinary needs. Today, we're proud to present the Fortune Oil 5-liter Pack, a versatile and essential product that will elevate your cooking to new heights.The Fortune Oil 5-liter Pack is a premium cooking oil that is known for its superior quality and excellent taste. Made from the finest ingredients and carefully extracted to preserve all the natural goodness, this oil is a favorite among professional chefs and home cooks alike. It is perfect for frying, sautéing, baking, and other culinary applications, adding a rich and delicious flavor to your dishes.This 5-liter pack is ideal for households and commercial kitchens that require a larger quantity of oil for everyday cooking. Whether you're preparing a simple stir-fry or a complex gourmet meal, the Fortune Oil will exceed your expectations with its exceptional performance and consistency. Plus, its convenient packaging ensures easy storage and handling, making it a must-have in any kitchen.When you choose the Fortune Oil 5-liter Pack, you're not just buying a cooking oil – you're investing in a premium product that will enhance the flavor and quality of your meals. Trust Fortune Oil to bring out the best in your cooking and make every dish a masterpiece. Order your pack today and experience the difference for yourself!

descriptor.name: Haldiram Sonpapdi
descriptor.short_desc: Delicious traditional Indian sweet made by Haldiram's.
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in the rich and decadent flavors of traditional Indian sweets with our Sonpapdi from Haldiram. This exquisite treat is a must-have for anyone with a sweet tooth, as it combines the perfect balance of sweetness and crunch in every bite.Made with the finest ingredients and crafted with precision, our Sonpapdi is a true representation of authentic Indian flavors. The delicate layers of flaky pastry are infused with a heavenly blend of ghee, sugar, and cardamom, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience that is simply unparalleled.Each piece of Sonpapdi is carefully handcrafted by skilled artisans at Haldiram, ensuring that every bite is a taste of perfection. Whether you are celebrating a special occasion or simply craving a sweet treat, our Sonpapdi is guaranteed to satisfy your cravings and leave you craving for more.Bring home the taste of India with our Sonpapdi from Haldiram and experience the joy of indulging in a time-honored sweet treat that has been loved by generations. Perfect for gifting or enjoying with loved ones, this delectable sweet is sure to leave a lasting impression and create cherished memories that will be savored for years to come.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.nutritional_info:
Energy: Approximately 500 kcal
Carbohydrates: ~55g (primarily from sugar and flour)
Sugars: ~45g
Protein: ~7g (from gram flour and milk solids)
Fat: ~25g
Saturated Fat: ~10g
Trans Fat: 0g (typically trans-fat free)
Cholesterol: Minimal (~5mg)
Dietary Fiber: ~2g
Sodium: ~120mg
Calcium: ~40mg
Iron: ~2mg
@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.additives_info:
Emulsifiers: Used to maintain texture and consistency.
Preservatives: Typically includes E202 (Potassium Sorbate) to increase shelf life.
Artificial Colors: May include Tartrazine (E102) for coloring.
Artificial Flavoring Agents: Could contain synthetic flavoring like Vanillin.
Stabilizers: Ingredients such as E415 (Xanthan Gum) may be used to stabilize the product.
Antioxidants: Likely includes E320 (Butylated Hydroxyanisole - BHA) to prevent oxidation of fats.

descriptor.name: Chana Dal 1 Kg
descriptor.short_desc: Premium quality Chana Dal packed in a convenient 1 Kg pack
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our extensive collection of Dals and Pulses, where you will find the finest quality Chana Dal in a convenient 1 Kg pack. Chana Dal, also known as split chickpeas, is a staple ingredient in Indian cuisine and is loved for its rich and nutty flavor. Our Chana Dal is sourced from trusted farms that use sustainable and ethical farming practices to ensure the highest quality product.Each kernel of Chana Dal is carefully cleaned, sorted, and processed to retain its natural goodness and nutritional value. Packed with protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, Chana Dal is not only delicious but also a healthy addition to your diet.Our 1 Kg pack of Chana Dal is perfect for stocking up your pantry and is ideal for households, restaurants, catering businesses, and more. Whether you are making classic dishes like Chana Dal curry, dal fry, or adding it to soups, salads, and snacks, our Chana Dal is versatile and easy to cook.When you choose our Chana Dal, you can be confident that you are getting a premium product that is free from any additives, preservatives, or artificial ingredients. We prioritize quality and freshness, ensuring that you get the best Chana Dal experience every time you cook with it.So why wait? Order your 1 Kg pack of Chana Dal today and elevate your cooking with the authentic flavors of this versatile and nutritious pulse. Enjoy the convenience of shopping online and have your favorite pulses delivered straight to your doorstep. Shop now and experience the difference with our top-quality Chana Dal!

descriptor.name: Masoor Dal 1 Kg Pack
descriptor.short_desc: High-quality Masoor Dal packed with nutrients and flavor.
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our Dals and Pulses category, where you can find the highest quality Masoor Dal in convenient 1 pack sizes. Masoor Dal, also known as Red Lentils, is a staple in Indian cuisine and holds immense nutritional value.Our Masoor Dal is sourced from trusted suppliers and undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure that only the finest Dal reaches your kitchen. Packed with protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, Masoor Dal is an excellent addition to a balanced diet.Each pack contains pure, unadulterated Masoor Dal that has been carefully cleaned and sorted to remove any impurities. Our packaging is designed to keep the Dal fresh and preserve its natural flavors and nutrients.Whether you are looking to make a comforting bowl of Dal tadka, a hearty Dal makhani, or a delicious dal soup, our Masoor Dal is the perfect choice. With its rich, nutty flavor and quick cooking time, this versatile ingredient can be used in a variety of dishes.Add our Masoor Dal to your cart today and elevate your cooking with the finest quality Dals and Pulses available online. Experience the difference that premium ingredients can make in your favorite recipes.

descriptor.name: Fortune Oil 500 ML

One of our top offerings in this category is the Fortune Oil 500 ML, a premium quality cooking oil that is sure to elevate your culinary experience.The Fortune Oil 500 ML is a pure and natural cooking oil that is extracted from the finest quality seeds, ensuring that you get nothing but the best in terms of taste and nutritional value. This cooking oil is rich in essential nutrients and vitamins, making it a healthy choice for all your cooking needs.With its high smoke point and light texture, the Fortune Oil 500 ML is perfect for all types of cooking, whether you are sautéing, frying, or baking. It enhances the flavors of your dishes without overpowering them, allowing you to create mouth-watering meals that your family and guests will love.This cooking oil comes in a convenient 500 ML pack, making it easy to store and use whenever you need it. The packaging is sturdy and leak-proof, ensuring that the oil stays fresh and flavorful for longer periods.Whether you are a professional chef or a home cook, the Fortune Oil 500 ML is a must-have in your kitchen. Its exceptional quality and versatility make it a staple in households across the country. Try it today and experience the difference it can make in your cooking!

descriptor.name: Premium Black Tea - 500g
descriptor.short_desc: Indulge in the rich and bold flavors of this premium black tea blend. Perfect for your morning pick-me-up or a relaxing afternoon break.
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our Tea and Coffee category, specifically the Tea 1 Pack section! Here you will find a luxurious selection of single-packaged teas that are perfect for enjoying a relaxing moment of tranquility or for sharing with friends and family.Our Tea 1 Pack collection features a wide variety of premium teas sourced from the finest tea estates around the world. From delicate white teas to bold black teas, aromatic green teas to herbaceous herbal teas, there is something for every tea lover in this assortment.Each tea pack is carefully curated and individually packaged to ensure freshness and flavor. Whether you prefer a classic Earl Grey, a soothing chamomile blend, an energizing matcha green tea, or a spicy chai, you will find the perfect tea pack to suit your taste preferences.We pride ourselves on offering high-quality teas that are ethically sourced and sustainably produced. Many of our tea packs are organic, non-GMO, and fair trade certified, so you can feel good about supporting responsible practices while enjoying a delicious cup of tea.Whether you are looking to treat yourself to a moment of relaxation, impress a guest with a flavorful brew, or give a thoughtful gift to a fellow tea enthusiast, our Tea 1 Pack collection is sure to delight. So browse our selection, find your favorite tea pack, and indulge in the luxurious experience of sipping on perfection.

descriptor.name: Premium Coffee - 500g
descriptor.short_desc: Indulge in the rich and bold flavor of our Premium Coffee in this 500g pack.
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to our premium coffee selection, where we bring you the finest quality coffee beans sourced from the best coffee-growing regions around the world. Our Premium Coffee - 500g is a true gem for any coffee enthusiast looking to elevate their coffee experience to new heights.Each bag of our Premium Coffee contains 500g of carefully selected coffee beans that have been expertly roasted to perfection to bring out the unique flavors and aromas of each bean. Whether you prefer a bold and robust dark roast or a smooth and aromatic medium roast, we have something for every coffee lover in our premium coffee range.Our coffee beans are ethically sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize quality and environmental stewardship. We work directly with farmers to ensure fair wages and sustainable growing practices, so you can feel good about the coffee you're drinking.To ensure that you enjoy your coffee at its peak freshness, each bag of our Premium Coffee is packaged in a resealable bag that helps preserve the flavor and aroma of the coffee beans. Whether you brew your coffee in a French press, pour-over, or espresso machine, our premium coffee will deliver a rich and flavorful cup every time.Experience the luxury of our Premium Coffee - 500g and treat yourself to an indulgent coffee experience that will awaken your senses and delight your taste buds. Upgrade your morning routine with a cup of our premium coffee and discover the true pleasure of exceptional coffee. Shop now and elevate your coffee game with our Premium Coffee - 500g.

descriptor.name: Dawat Biriyani Rice 1kg
descriptor.short_desc: Premium quality basmati rice perfect for making biriyani dishes.
descriptor.long_desc: Dive into the exquisite world of premium quality rice with the Dawat Biriyani Rice 1kg, a must-have for all your culinary adventures. Sourced from the finest rice paddies, this top-grade Basmati rice offers a uniquely long and slender grain with a delicate aroma and rich flavor, making it the perfect choice for crafting the most delectable biriyani dishes.Each grain is carefully handpicked and aged to perfection to ensure a superior texture and taste that will elevate your cooking to new heights. Whether you're a seasoned chef or an amateur home cook, the Dawat Biriyani Rice 1kg is versatile enough to be used in a variety of dishes such as biriyanis, pulaos, and even risottos.Experience the ultimate dining pleasure with this premium quality rice that promises to deliver a feast for your senses. With its excellent cooking properties, distinct flavor profile, and unparalleled quality, the Dawat Biriyani Rice 1kg is a staple that no kitchen should be without. Indulge in the luxury of fine dining at home with this exceptional rice product that is sure to impress even the most discerning food connoisseurs.

descriptor.name: Kaju Katli 250g
descriptor.short_desc: Delicious and premium quality Kaju Katli packed to perfection
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in the rich and decadent flavor of our premium Kaju Katli, a classic Indian sweet that is a favorite amongst sweet lovers everywhere. Made from the finest quality cashews, sugar, and ghee, our Kaju Katli is a melt-in-your-mouth delicacy that is sure to delight your taste buds.Each packet of our Kaju Katli is meticulously crafted by skilled artisans who have perfected the art of making this traditional sweet over generations. The cashews are ground to a smooth paste, mixed with just the right amount of sugar, and cooked to perfection before being cut into diamond-shaped pieces. The result is a sweet treat that is both soft and chewy, with a rich and nutty flavor that is simply irresistible.Our Kaju Katli is packaged in a beautiful, decorative box that makes it perfect for gifting or special occasions. Whether you are celebrating a festival, anniversary, birthday, or simply want to treat yourself to something special, our Kaju Katli is the perfect choice.Experience the authentic taste of India with our Kaju Katli, and discover why it has been a beloved sweet for centuries. Order a packet today and savor the deliciousness of this classic Indian delicacy.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.nutritional_info:
Energy: ~450-500 kcal
Carbohydrates: ~50g (mostly from sugar)
Sugars: ~45g (from refined sugar)
Protein: ~8-10g (primarily from cashews)
Fat: ~25g
Saturated Fat: ~6g
Trans Fat: 0g (usually free of trans fats)
Cholesterol: 0mg (generally cholesterol-free as it’s plant-based)
Dietary Fiber: ~3g (from cashews)
Sodium: ~50mg (minimal)
Calcium: ~30mg
Iron: ~3mg
@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.additives_info:
Silver Foil (Vark): If used, the silver foil is often certified edible and free of aluminum or other contaminants.
Preservatives: Typically minimal in traditional preparation, but commercial versions may use E202 (Potassium Sorbate) to extend shelf life.
Artificial Flavoring: Some versions may include synthetic flavor enhancers such as Vanillin to intensify taste.
Artificial Colors: Typically, Kaju Katli is free from artificial colors, but in some cases, E171 (Titanium Dioxide) might be used for a bright white appearance.
Stabilizers: E415 (Xanthan Gum) or other stabilizers might be used in mass-produced versions to maintain texture.
